This is how I feel as well. I loved joining random 1 to 3 day tournaments and trying all sorts of decks. The 4 to 30 card reward was always an afterthought. Now I'm spending 10 gems for challenges and I end up facing very skilled players who dominate any deck I'm trying to test out. I end up resorting to my go to decks to be successful which defeats the purpose for testing out decks!
I had the same experience. Used to rocking tourneys and 3 crowns at 3100 ladder. Challenge mode is living up to its namesake.
I'd rather that than 8 skarmy and 2 lightning
If your furnace isn't level 8 try a tombstone to counter hog and giant.

Lol I fully understand Sparky logic. That's why I can counter it and be successful with the cards I currently use. I do a 3M beatdown and just this morning broke 3400. F2P if that means anything anymore. Anyways the whole point is that the log buff will be quite welcome. I've always been a big fan of it.
Children appreciate him!

Obviously. But you're still missing my point. Take my deck for example, it has log and stab gobs, no zap, nothing cheaper than a mini p. If for instance my gabs are out of rotation and sparky is a couple tower arrows from death, what's the logical play? Sacrifice my 4 elixir mini p or toss a log to push it back and finish it off with 1 more tower arrows. Both plays negate the shot, only 1 is the right choice.
You're doing God's work
You people are amazing and very caring. This world needs more.
My thoughts exactly. This one got me good. I thought it was going to be an r/MadeMeSmile post or r/HumansBeingBros but then I got to the last image. Well played OP

When you just don't have a choice and also can't fit skeletons into your deck. This is an option. We're not talking perfect situations here. Obviously a zap would work better too.
Use him for Xbox or mortar defense. Funny things happen when he dies.
No but it can force a retarget or buy your tower enough time to finish it without having to drop a 3+ elixir card to absorb the hit
No but if she's locked on to the tower and you want to save a shot use log to make her retarget. Same with a giant or golem. Make them retarget to a canon or something

Guy had a level 9 fireball to murder my level 8 3M. I threw him a good game knowing that his fireball was coming for the win, unfortunately for him my leading ladies had other plans. I bet he regrets not fireballing them and cycling back. Anyways, broke into the 3400 club with my 10/7.5/0/1 deck!

I find this a lot more plausible. When light was released I thought, OK cool Hunter has a son in act 5. But since the album came out, the song and the theory about his son made little sense.
That's nothing compared to your golem getting 1 shot by an ice spirit

I guess I'm a bit biased since those are the two I use the most. I run a beatdown deck where I spend the first 2 mins defending with knight, gobs, IW, log and fire spirits. I find the log indispensable in most defense situations. I use it in a rocket deck as well where I ended up hitting barbs and a valk with the log knocking them back into a witch while my rocket was coming at her. Knocking a miner off an EC and making him retarget the king tower is also fun.
Log is the best legendary after ice wiz. So much utility!
What's your deck? I'm sitting on 32/4 rage cards
What's the over leveled knight like?
You messed up. Ask for maple syrup next time

What if Mr usher and Hunter are once and the same. Hunter may have gone off the deep end and has a split persona. Mr. Usher could just be that little devil on his shoulder convincing him to commit terrible deeds, while Hunter is trying retain some sanity.

I've been tossing around this idea for a bit, but what if Mr. Usher isn't actually real but either a figment of Hunter's imagination or just Hunter himself when he's up to bad things. I find a lot lyrics and potential scenarios lend itself to this. I'm at work so I can't reference them for now.

The trick with tank and 3M beatdown is to bring cheap cards that you can defend well with and minimize damage while you prepare to push. For me, knight, gobs, fire spirits, ice wizard and log are all I use for the first 2 mins unless I get 2 pumps down. If you defend well you gain a huge advantage. Obviously if I see an RG, giant or golem, 3M are deployed.

I just had 3 matches of RG/witch, RG/Sparky and RG/3M.
Only the Sparky gave me trouble because I don't run zap.
Well since it's a fantasy game where anything can happen, I'm just going to assume the miner and valk are engaging in coitus.
Thanks, I'll give this a try in tournament before going live in the ladder. I'll put that level 4 balloon to use
Mind sharing your strategy behind this?

It's basically what I do every other game. I don't thumbs up though, I hit battle and as soon as it loads I exit out, free 3 crowns for a lucky soul. I like to stay right at 3100. There's no need to move up until there's an actual incentive.
Screenshot or it didn't hap.... Oh wait.

Put a hog in at least. Try to generate more chip damage so you can get into rocket range. I've been using hog, LJ, musketeer, ice wiz, furnace, rocket, log and fire spirits. Been working well in both tournaments and 3000+ ladder
No intelligent 3M player would stack them in the same lane without first baiting the rocket, fireball or poison

As a giant 3M user I let the trifecta have their way in the opposite lane. I'll lose maybe half my tower health by the time I deploy 3M which obliterates the valk hog. After that my 3M split they're fucked once the knight deploys and tanks for the single musketeer. Enjoy countering that with the giant crossing the bridge.

That's the Master Sparky deck. There's another thread asking for a guide to use it. Drop them a line if you can.
https://www.reddit.com/r/ClashRoyale/comments/50zzpa/anyone_want_me_to_make_a_guide_on_master_sparkys/

Lvl 10 F2P with found ice wiz, log and sparky and miner. Bought princess, saving for LJ now. I troll around at 3100 winning 90% of my games and giving out 3 crown wins to others by exiting to keep my trophies at 3100. I see no purpose in moving up in trophies until SC gives an incentive. I run a 3M deck that uses IW and log. 10/8/0/1 card levels. I have enough cards to boost my 3 Commons to 11, but I'd rather buy the LJ and experiment with decks in tourneys. I've been pretty fucking lucky with my legendaries. Been play 2 accounts since soft launch and my alt has no legendaries while my main found 4.
So it had nothing to do with the Pokemon Go fad? No offense but young people have difficulties sticking to a single game long term.
Hahaha thanks for reminding me of that Simpsons quote

Can't speak for everyone else but I grew my beard out of laziness. Shaving every day or two for that smooth look was so fucking annoying and irritating. 5 years later and I don't regret it a single day. I shaved it off once in the 5 years and it was terrible. My wife won't let me shave it off now, she says it's not fair that I can make myself look 10 years younger by just shaving haha.

... I can't even... Come on man, it's a couple fucking weeks

Ever think that maybe you just don't belong in this trophy range with those cards levels? Sure you may have more skill, but currently your cards don't match up so it's an uphill struggle. Since you're stuck in A8, drop down to 2300-2400 range and chill there until your cards are adequate level.
It's no different for me in A9. I stay at 3100 on purpose because I'll just run into level 12s and 13s if I push up to 3400 - 3600 What's the point then? I've tested my deck and skill, I know I can climb up, but I can't sustain it.
Nothing, it's a game I play for fun.

No real deck to work off of. I'm just interested in a recommendation for a good deck that uses rocket. I got a fuck ton of rocket cards from an SMC and magical chest.

I don't want to sound like an asshole, but if you're letting stupid children on the internet get the best of you then you need to reevaluate things. So they act feeble and start taunting you. Fuck em. Just high road your way with a well played/good game and move on. Game is designed to force you to lose, don't let the little shits get the best of you.
Side note: just get to arena 9. It happens a lot less because there's so many lame RG decks and the players know they've got no right to taunt you with such a shit deck.
LJ is pretty interchangeable now with mini P. Give it a shot
I faced off against a couple giant poison decks and they wrecked me. Not sure how you're handling those beatdown decks.

Are you just chipping at a tower until you can rocket it?
I've been sitting in legendary for a while and I've bought all the cards for this deck (except LJ). I'll be buying LJ once I save up the gold again. Of course he has to appear in the shop as well.

I've been trying to find a viable deck for both tourney and 3000+ ladder play that uses the rocket well. I can get it to level 9 because an SMC and magical chest shat out a bunch of cards for it. Any suggestions?
I'd just straight up swap golem for lavahound. That way you don't have to worry about leveling a golem up.

Have you considered the dark Prince over the Prince? I realize the Prince is your main win condition, but a raged DP is something fierce. You also save 1 elixir and have ground AOE to deal with barbs. I run something a bit similar to your main deck, but with DP instead of LJ(don't have him) and furnace instead of EC. I realize you've been dominating with your deck, but curious to know if DP could get it done just as well, if not better.
I'd like to see him try a fartbow deck

First off I'm well aware about the f2p circle jerk, secondly I don't need to toot my own horn about being f2p. It means fuck all at this stage of the game. I didn't come on here stating that I'm in arena whatever at some bogus trophy level. No one gives a shit about those statements anymore. But thanks for the advice anyways.

Time and time again this comes up. But what does it matter in the end? It's currently just bragging rights. It has no effect on 99% of the player base. Ladder rankings and fighting amongst the whales means fuck all. Tournaments and an even playing field for the entire player base is what does and will matter. IMO competitions like the Super Magical Cup are the best parts of this game and reading the summaries of the competition/watching the highlight are great.
But I'm a nobody f2p player. This is just my lowly opinion.

I'm not really sure what's up. I can't really offer anything other than I'm on the latest build with no battery drain. I'm fact my battery is noticeably better. I sit at 3100 on purpose. I'll play and win a game, then start another match and quit out giving my opponent a 3 crown. I do this after every win, pretty sure I've provided a crap ton of 3 crowns to struggling players. There's no real incentive to push any higher for me.
